import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch,useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import {ADD_INSCRIPTION_ACTION} from './../Actions/actions' export default function AddInscription() { const mesInscriptions = useSelector(state=>state) const [id,setId]=useState(mesInscriptions.length+1) const [nom,setNom]=useState('') const [filiere,setFiliere]=useState('') const dispatch = useDispatch() const navigate=useNavigate() const Enregistrer = (e) => { dispatch(ADD_INSCRIPTION_ACTION({id:id,nom:nom,filiere:filiere})) navigate('/'); } return (

Add Inscription :

setId(e.target.value)}/>
setNom(e.target.value)}/>
setFiliere(e.target.value)}/>
) }
